title: Getting Notifications On The Lock Screen
content:
Hello
When locked, my screen is always just black - it never shows if I have messages, missed calls, emails, WhatsApp messages, etc.
I have set it show all Notifications, and UK Chat got me to reset App defaults, but nothing.
I know that, unlike my old Samsung S4, there is no LED that can show you when you have a pending message, and this is a major loss of functionality for me.
I am missing lots of messages and this is very frustrating. 
Any suggestions would be gratefully received.
